msg: (svn_swig_pl_callback_thunk): Better fix for the problem fixed in r8397.

author: epg
msg: Vote for 8390.  Add and vote for 8397 and 8398.

author: epg
msg: Put libraries and linker flags into the LIBS rather than
OTHERLDFLAGS.  This is effectively the same, but allows the
bindings to build under package systems that override
OTHERLDFLAGS.  Other Perl modules also use LIBS, not OTHERLDFLAGS.

author: epg
msg: (svn_swig_pl_callback_thunk): r8270 introduced a buglet: a new
statement was placed between two declarations.  Fix.
